topics.body:
"@Silent_Witness":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54c496e96368725a640e0600#post_54c496e96368725a640e0600
And about the Silmarillion:
_Good. *Fuck.*_ It's been a while since I've actually read any Tolkien, but I remember that his writing can be a bit... _thick_. But the Silmarillion is almost impenetrable at times.
And the names. So many names. I'm not even halfway through the thing, and it's already named at least a hundred characters. Granted they don't always have a major role to play, but I'm not ashamed to say that I have to keep flipping back and forth to the index to be reminded who everyone is and why they're important. That said, I actually have an idea of the goings-on in the book thus far, so it's not all bad.
topics.author: 5043cdb47f123b72cc0032d3

topics.body:

BEER[/bq]
OOOOOH! What is the malted liquor?  What gets you drunker quicker?  What comes in bottles or cans?
BEER!
Can't get enough of it!
BEER!
*. . .*
I can't remember how much I have had; I drank a twelve pack with my dad.
That's my son that drunk and badly stud; I'm proud to be his bud.
Here have some pretzels.
No; I'll call it quits; those give me the shits.

(yes this is a real song)
